shape_0_per_frame1=r = q1;
shape_0_per_frame2=b = q2;
shape_0_per_frame3=g = q3;
shape_0_per_frame4=r2 = 1-abs(q1);
shape_0_per_frame5=b2 = q2;
shape_0_per_frame6=g2 = q3;
shape_0_per_frame7=ang = ang + 12*tan(time);
shape_0_per_frame8=x = x + 0.15*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame9=y = y + 0.15*cos(time);
shape_0_per_frame10=a = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(bass_att);
shape_0_per_frame11=//a2 = 0.5 + 0.5*cos(bass_att);
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=0

shapecode_1_g=1.000

shapecode_1_border_a=0.100

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_g = int(rand(255))/255;
per_frame_2=wave_b = int(rand(255))/255;
per_frame_3=wave_r = int(rand(255))/255;
per_frame_4=q1=bass_att+4;
per_frame_5=q2=treb_att+4;
per_frame_6=q3=2*pow(abs(bass_att-oldb),2+abs(treb_att-oldt));
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=//not sure if it looks better with this line
per_frame_9=q3=q3*0.7+abs(mid-oldm)*0.5;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=oldb=bass;
per_frame_12=oldt=treb;
per_frame_13=oldm=mid;
per_frame_14=zoom=zoom+q3;
per_pixel_1=sy=abs(0.5-y)*sin(rad*3.1416*q1)*q3+sy;
per_pixel_2=sx=abs(0.5-(x-cos(ang*q2)))*0.3*q3+sx;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{ret=GetPixel(uv);
warp_3=`float d=lum(abs(uv-uv_orig))*0.6+0.003;
warp_4=`float3 inp[5];
warp_5=`//float3 sex,drugs,rock,roll,bugs;
warp_6=`float3 wout[5];
warp_7=`float3 maxx;
warp_8=`inp[0]=max(
warp_9=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y-d))),
warp_10=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y)))
warp_11=`);
warp_12=`inp[1]=max(
warp_13=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y+d))),
warp_14=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y-d)))
warp_15=`);
warp_16=`inp[2]=max(
warp_17=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y))),
warp_18=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y+d)))
warp_19=`);
warp_20=`inp[3]=max(
warp_21=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y-d))),
warp_22=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y)))
warp_23=`);
warp_24=`inp[4]=abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y+d)));
warp_25=`wout[0]=abs(inp[0]-ret);
warp_26=`wout[1]=abs(inp[1]-ret);
warp_27=`wout[2]=abs(inp[2]-ret);
warp_28=`wout[3]=abs(inp[3]-ret);
warp_29=`wout[4]=abs(inp[4]-ret);
warp_30=`maxx=max(inp[0],max(inp[1],max(inp[2],max(inp[3],inp[4]))));
warp_31=`ret=saturate(maxx);
warp_32=`ret=(ret+GetPixel(uv+ret.xy*0.01)*0.8)/1.4*saturate(0.8+saturate(q3.xxx));
warp_33=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret=GetPixel(uv);
comp_4=`ret*=ret;
comp_5=`float3 b1= GetBlur1(uv);
comp_6=`float3 b2= GetBlur2(uv);
comp_7=`float3 b3= GetBlur3(uv);
comp_8=`//ret+=normalize(ret)*pow(GetBlur2(uv),b3);
comp_9=`ret=pow(ret+(b3-b2+b1),2);
comp_10=`}
